title: Panasonic SC-NE1 Compact Wireless Speaker System with Bluetooth
description: Stream and share music stored on your mobile device, wirelesslyLets you enjoy your music in a whole new way, an innovative Music Streaming App that gives you more control. Supports all streaming technology (DLNA, AirPlay, Bluetooth Wireless) .Doesn't need a LAN network to operate, it can stream music from any Bluetooth Wireless Technology-compatible digital device!Bluetooth Re-Master Ensures Crystal-Clear SoundYou won't have to worry about lost or muffled signals ruining your sound, because the SC-NE1 automatically compensates for lost audio signals during Bluetooth wireless transmission. You'll always get high quality music, played on a world-class Panasonic speaker.Powerful Sound from a Compact SpeakerEquipped with a 2-Way Speaker System that boasts a 3-1/8" Long Stroke Woofer with a Nanosized Bamboo Cone and 1" Tweeter.  Gives you rich and robust sound, from crystal-clear treble to deep, pulsating bass.3-D Aero Stream Port Gives You Deep Bass with Less DistortionUses an innovative Aero Stream Port to produce dynamic bass with minimal distortion. Its unique 3-dimensional structure and rounded corners provide smoother and steadier airflow. Ensures you get a rich deep sound without the rumbling distortion that detracts from your sonic experience.Nanosized Bamboo Cone Speaker Provides Fresher, Clearer TonesEquipped with a bamboo cone speaker which provides greater sonic clarity while minimizing distortion.Pure Direct Sound System Reduces NoiseComes with noise-canceling technology. Using digital signal processing, it reduces the scattering so your sound is clean and pure, with significantly less distortion.
